p: All chemicals/reagents, and assay kits used were of analytical grade. These were purchased from local distributors in Ethiopia. Chemicals such as absolute Ethanol from Wisteam PLC, Potassium dihydrogen phosphate (anhydrous), and Sodium phosphate (dibasic anhydrous, extra pure) were purchased from Micron International Trading House PLC. Formaldehyde and Isoflurane from Neway Chemicals PLC, Addis Ababa. The Kits for liver function test from a Roshi PLC through EPHI, EDTA tubes, Serum Separator tubes, Capillary tubes, and surgical blade were purchased from Micro Pharma PLC in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia.
